description: Aoshima Toshiyuki is a playboy around the Nekomi Institute of Technology campus and http://anidb.net/ch6957 [Sayoko]`s cousin. He is enamoured by http://anidb.net/ch2234 [Belldandy] and tries often to steal her away from http://anidb.net/ch2215 [Keiichi], going as far as to set up a rival motor club. In the TV series, he and his cousin Sayoko can be identified by the super cars that they drive.
name: Aoshima Toshiyuki
